lines: Aldous hands Aaron his joint.  Aaron, not wanting to seem uncool, takes a toke.

So I’m like so fucked, you know, I can hardly see straight and then this bird I’m with is like all “put me down, put me down” and I don’t even know I’m carrying her I’m that high so I drop her on her ass.
Cops busted in, looked for my shit, couldn’t find it, left, and then we fucked.
